title: Blest Be the Tie That Binds

author.name: John Fawcett
author.bio: John Fawcett was an English Baptist pastor, theologian, and hymn writer. His hymn 'Blest Be the Tie That Binds' is a beloved piece reflecting the unity and fellowship of the Christian community.

lyrics:
Blest be the tie that binds,
Our hearts in Christian love,
The fellowship of kindred minds
Is like to that above.

Before our Father's throne,
We pour our ardent prayers;
Our fears, our hopes
Our aims are one,
Our comforts and our cares.

We share our mutual woes,
Our mutual burdens bear;
And often for each other flows,
The sympathizing tear.

When we asunder part,
It gives us inward pain;
But we shall still
Be joined in heart,
And hope to meet again.
